relevant_communication: Our business case is an example how to implement the sustainability goals.
goals__remit: We design and manufacture comfortable sustainable furniture, made from recovered (ocean) plastics. We want to stop deforestation, reduce plastic waste, create local jobs and make our products 100% circular.
